pluginInfo.tool-description: Informatica Data Services enables companies to directly access and merge data across remote systems in your organization.

link.title: Informatica
link.description: Please refer to the website for additional information on Informatica.

meta.name: description
meta.content: uDeploy plugin for automating Informatica tasks

release-notes.release-note: Loading the Informatica plugin will give users access to the Informatica steps for use when designing your component process.
Added a new property to Import Objects Step to allow the user to specify to retain the generated sequence numbers.

Add an option to the Import Objects step to allow automatic checkin after an object import. The comment for the checkin will be a list of the source folders and current date.Make includes case insensitive.
Fix password field processing to handle empty sting value as well as null.
Fix IMPORTPARAMS element bug.
Fix IMPORTPARAMS element bug.
Update
Update
Fix Create Folder step incorrectly used the -shared folder argument.

Import Objects Step Updates: - Default Conflict Resolution property is now a selectBox with RENAME, REUSE, and REPLACE options. - On failure, the step will now terminate correctly. The stacktrace will be printed for debugging purposes.
Added functionality for the AssignPermission pmrep command.

Added the following functionality and updates: - Revamped the build.xml to no longer use plugin-build.xml. Now uses Apache Ivy to download dependencies. - Added groovy-plugin-utils-1.0.jar library. - Runs successfully without extra libs or jars. - Added the Copy Deployment Group (COPYDEPLOYMENTGROUP) pmrep control file property to Deploy Deployment Group step. - Removed the "launch..." scripts, added classes and groovy-plug-utils-1.0.jar to all classpaths. - Added EPL license.
Updated plugin-groovy-utils to v1.2. Updated build.xml and plugin folder structure.

Added security domain property to step "Import Objects" to fix authentication problem Added LANG property to step "Import Objects" to fix encodeing problem All default property references are now optional.

The following updates have been made to the Import Objects step: - Added a new line to prevent the Security Domain argument from bleeding into the following line. - Now able to specify files paths for the Folder Mapping, Repository Mapping, and Conflict Resolution Rules list properties.
Fixed import_object security domain lines seperation, while leaving space so that does not bleed into next variable or create new line in connection string.

Fixed security vulnerability in import_objects.groovy: On exit, the generated script file will be deleted. Added Security Domain, LANG, and INFAHOME environment properties to the Validate Deployment Group step.
Added INFA HOME property to the Create Dynamic Deployment Group step.
The Roll Back Deployment Group Step properly uses the -t flag.
Pull Request #23 - Import Objects step no longer adds Retain Generated Value and Checkin After Import parameters to control file if not selected.

Issue #18 - Type property added to the Create Dynamic Deployment step. Issue #19 - INFA HOME property added to the Deploy Deployment Group step. INFA_HOME, LD_LIBRARY_PATH, and LIBPATH environment variables are set in the Create Deploy Deployment and Deploy Deployment Group steps. Removed extra execute command from the Validate Deployment step.
Issue #26 - Security Domain property added to Apply Label step.
Issue #28 - Property "Security Domain" missing on several steps.
Added Folder Migration and Validate Folder Migration steps.

pluginInfo.release-note: Added a new step - "Deploy Multiple Deployment Groups"
